item.title: Pump Aid- Elephant Pump Animation
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N3BQsjRKnHo Pump Aid’s Elephant Pump was developed and tested in Zimbabwe by Pump Aid and is based on a 2000 year old Chinese rope-and-washer design. It is cheap, simple and durable. It can be easily constructed from materials available locally and can be maintained by local communities. In this clip there is a 3-D animation of the pump, showing it’s inner workings during operation. For more information, visit http://www.pumpaid.org
